name: search_countries_by_idd
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool geography.
Tool description: Powerful APIs for getting information about Countries and Cities
API description: Searches for countries using their International Direct Dialing (IDD) number.

idd.description: International Direct Dialing number, starting with '+'.

limit.description: The maximum number of records to return in a single page. Defaults to 10.

offset.description: The page number from which the search should continue. Its zero indexed, hence, starts with 0

fields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to filter the response. Defaults to None.
